comments.content:
Yep, I think there's  a general desire to move away from having all the services directly access the DB ... it just needs someone to work on it

The compute side is being worked on: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/no-db-compute

Feel free to propose and work on a similar blueprint for nova-network
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content: We've implemented this for nova-compute.  I don't think we should for nova-network.  I think using Quantum is the answer for this at this point.
